ai-patthana15.58:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.58:0.3_0: Next there are nectar with skillful qualities,
ai-patthana15.58:1.1_0: Perceptions of the skillful preoccupations doesn’t give rise to diversity of thoughts. ...
ai-patthana15.58:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
ai-patthana15.58:2.1_0: Perception is not skilled in the unskillful, nor is a cause.
